KnowledgeSuggestionFilter.name: KnowledgeSuggestionFilter
KnowledgeSuggestionFilter.description: Filter settings that narrow the results from a call to System.Search.suggest(searchQuery, sObjectType, options) when the SOSL search query contains a KnowledgeArticleVersion object.

QuestionSuggestionFilter.name: QuestionSuggestionFilter
QuestionSuggestionFilter.description: The Search.QuestionSuggestionFilter class filters results from a call to System.Search.suggest(searchQuery, sObjectType, options) when the SOSL searchQuery  contains a FeedItem object.

SearchResult.name: SearchResult
SearchResult.description: A wrapper object that contains an sObject and search metadata.

SearchResults.name: SearchResults
SearchResults.description: Wraps the results returned by the Search.find(String​) method.

SuggestionOption.name: SuggestionOption
SuggestionOption.description: Options that narrow record and article suggestion results returned from a call to System.Search.suggest(String, String, Search.SuggestionOption).

SuggestionResult.name: SuggestionResult
SuggestionResult.description: A wrapper object that contains an sObject.

SuggestionResults.name: SuggestionResults
SuggestionResults.description: Wraps the results returned by the Search.suggest(​String, String, Search.SuggestionOption) method.
